subject: Colleges and Universities
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Connecticut defensive tackle Jarrell Miller, one of the highest-rated recruits the Huskies have landed, has left the school, the university announced. UConn said Miller left the program for personal reasons.
snippet: Connecticut defensive tackle Jarrell Miller, one of the highest-rated recruits the Huskies have landed, has left the school, the university announced. UConn said Miller left the program for personal reasons.
